QuestData.Title: Skullsplitter Mojo
QuestData.Description: <The skull speaks again.>$b$bI have my body, thanks to you, your raptor, and Gan'zulah. Now, if I remember correctly, you and your witch doctor friend will need some mojo to complete this ritual.$b$bThe Bloodscalps keep mojo in Zul'Kunda, but it is weak. Your Darkspears' mojo will not work either. No... you want to take from the Skullsplitter trolls, across the river to the east.$b$bHurry back, $r. I will be watching...
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Skullsplitter Mojos from Skullsplitter trolls in the Ziata'jai Ruins and the Balia'mah Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: <The large troll skull floats around within the cauldron.>
QuestData.RewardText: <You throw the mojo into the pot.>$b$bExcellent work, $r. You and your raptor have done a great thing. Hakkar would be most pleased...
